subject: Re: How can I get Junit Test to run in parallel threads?
msgSnippet: ... Thanks for being kind! BTW thanks to the many replies, I found the extension and everything seems to work fine.  Now I can simulate lots of users hammering
messageBody:
> Rob, I don't have the answer for you, but I'd like to thank you for
> posing the question this way. EVERYONE PAY ATTENTION.
>
> "Can anyone recommend a package out there THAT WILL EXTEND JUNIT..."
>
> Beautiful. JUnit doesn't have to do everything, folks.

Thanks for being kind!

BTW thanks to the many replies, I found the extension and everything
seems to work fine. Now I can simulate lots of users hammering on
transactions at the same time. Except that now Clearcase seems to
have chewed the source up and swallowed it (good thing I make backups
on a floppy!)

Cheers
Rob
Lowly Consultant,
NYC
